sentence.Network_en: She felt like an interloper in her own family.
sentence.Network_cn: 她感到在自己家里像个外人。

sentence.Network_en: In the constituencies of Great Britain she was still an interloper - cold, affected, and unacceptably right wing.
sentence.Network_cn: 在大不列颠国内的各选区,人们仍然把她视为半路闯出来的陌生人 —— 一个冷漠, 矫揉造作的极右派.

sentence.Network_en: Both creatures shrunk back into the rocks, even though Judith's attention was fixed on the interloper.
sentence.Network_cn: 即使是现在茱蒂丝的注意力被入侵者完全吸引了,他俩还是不由自主地退回到了石堆里.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 2012年新GRE考试新增词汇（1）_新东方网 ... inveigh v. 痛骂 interloper n. 闯入者, 无营业执照者 ire v. 激怒.
词根词缀10-08(V2.0) - 豆丁网 ... elope vi 私奔 interloper n 入侵者，干涉者（跑入二者之间） lubricate vt 使润滑.
电影《阿凡达》相关英语介绍 ... humanoid 具有人类特点的 interlopers 入侵者 core narrative 主要故事.
SAT真题2006.1~2010.5词汇题单词整理... ... intercede 调解 interloper 干涉他人事务者 marginal 不重要的.

list.abs: 英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(72) _ 上海疯狂英语 ... interlocutory 对话的 interlope 干涉 interloper 闯入者.
he was the interloper , not they .他现在已是一个外人，而它们不是。
these interlopers may be setting themselves up for a merger or takeover of the Italian bank .这份报纸不大注意国外的事务。
...星。并且可以建构更完整的太阳系轨道动力系统。泛星计画还可能观测到「星际碎片」（interstellar debris）或「星际闯入者」（interstellar interlopers）飞经太阳系。一般认为这些物体可能是其他恒星的行星系统形成时被抛射出该系统。另一个有趣的可能性是泛星计画也许可以观测到目前尚未.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent. (denoting an unauthorized trader trespassing on the rights of a trade monopoly): from inter- 'amid' + -loper as in archaic landloper 'vagabond' (from Middle Dutch landlooper)

entry.tran: 闯入者;干涉他人事务者
entry.def: If you describe someone as an interloper, you mean that they have come into a situation or a place where they are not wanted or do not belong.

example.ex: She had no wish to share her father with any outsider and regarded us as interlopers.
example.tran: 她不愿与任何外人分享父亲的爱,并把我们视为闯入者。

means.word_mean: 1. someone who intrudes on the privacy or property of another without permission

auth_sentence.content: His abiding vulnerability is his image as an interloper.
auth_sentence.res_content: His abiding vulnerability is his image as an interloper.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: His abiding vulnerability is his image as an interloper.

auth_sentence.content: Now this scarlet interloper behaves with utter impunity.
auth_sentence.res_content: Now this scarlet interloper behaves with utter impunity.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Now this scarlet interloper behaves with utter impunity.

auth_sentence.content: It, too, is an interloper to the islands.
auth_sentence.res_content: It, too, is an interloper to the islands.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It, too, is an interloper to the islands.
